# LaTeX codes

### 1. `subcaption` 

This package offers an user interface to typeset sub-captions.

```{txt}
\usepackage{subcaption}
```

```{txt}
%Multiple figures 
\begin{figure} 
\begin{center} 
\begin{tabular}{cc} 
\subcaptionbox{\label{o131a}1975} {\rotatebox{0}{\scalebox{.4}{\includegraphics{o131a}}}} & 
\subcaptionbox{\label{o131b}1985} {\rotatebox{0}{\scalebox{.4}{\includegraphics{o131b}}}} 
\end{tabular} 
\caption{\label{fig1}Walmart store openings for every 10 years} 
\end{center} 
\end{figure}
```
